Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Principe, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Scalzi Bridge and Palazzo Labia. This 4-star hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 139 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as concierge services and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Hotel Principe, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Scalzi Bridge and Palazzo Labia. This 4-star hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Scalzi Bridge - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Palazzo Labia - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Riva de Biasio Waterbus - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Guglie Bridge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Guglie Waterbus - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Papadopoli Gardens - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Scuola Grande di San Giovanni Evangelista - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Fondaco of Turks - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Venetian Museum of Natural History - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
San Marcuola Waterbus Stop - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Venetian Ghetto - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Tolentini - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Casino Vendramin-Calergi - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Church of St. Roch - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Casino of Venice - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Principe is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
